workshop_name: Intensive Workshop in Prolonged Exposure Therapy for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) at Casa de Salud
workshop_description: Provide mental health professionals with an intensive Prolonged Exposure workshop to gain the skills and knowledge on how to utilize Prolonged Exposure Therapy to treat trauma survivors within their respective practices, organizations and community.
workshop_location: St. Louis Missouri, Casa de Salud
